name: Hüify
tag_list: digital-branding, facebook, marketing, facebook-advertising, twitter, linkedin, google, content-strategy
overview:
Hüify is a Digital Branding Agency.

Vision:

Become a premier global agency that focus on digital realism to connect with consumers on a personal level, while developing community managers that are well equipped for any market.

Mission Statement:

Inspire creative interaction by personalizing each brand, one customer at a time.

Culture:

Fun, open communication where individual ideas matter to drive the whole. we are equal, and our roles are defined. We are committed to encouraging one another to continual betterment in health, spirit, and mind.

Specialties Branding, Digital Marketing, Facebook Advertising, LinkedIn Advertising, Increasing Digital Presence, Personifying Company’s Voice Online
